subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The men’s Dubai Tennis Championships will start next week without five of the top seven players who were scheduled to compete, mostly because of injuries. Top-ranked Rafael Nadal (knee) and No. 2 Roger Federer (back) withdrew early last week.
snippet: The men’s Dubai Tennis Championships will start next week without five of the top seven players who were scheduled to compete, mostly because of injuries. Top-ranked Rafael Nadal (knee) and No. 2 Roger Federer (back) withdrew early last week.
